abilities.name: Brute.
abilities.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

abilities.name: Surprise Attack.
abilities.description: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

abilities.name: Heart of Hruggek.
abilities.description: The bugbear has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned, or put to sleep.
